content.question: The features of seventeenth-century Dutch life reflected in the painting were largely a result of which of the following?

choices.label: Dutch territorial gains in the Thirty Yearsâ€™ War
Dutch financial innovation and overseas trade
The accession of a member of the Dutch House of Orange to the throne of England
The successful raids of Dutch privateers against Spanish treasure fleets

content.answer: Dutch financial innovation and overseas trade

topic.text: 3.3: Continuities and Changes to Economic Practice and Development

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
